executable.title: Quantitative Indices
executable.description: Calculate quantitative indices for a specified label. Requires PET and label images as input.

integer.name: Label_Value
integer.label: Label Value
integer.description: Label Map value for region to be quantified

boolean.name: Mean
boolean.label: Mean
boolean.description: Mean value in region of interest

boolean.description: Variance in region of interest

boolean.description: Minimum value in region of interest
